name: Animal Handling
description: When there's any question whether you can calm a domesticated animal, keep a mount from getting spooked, or intuit an animal's intentions, the DM might call for a Wisdom (Animal Handling) check. You also make a Wisdom (Animal Handling) check to control your mount when you attempt a risky maneuver.
typicalUses: Calm a frightened or agitated animal
Intuit an animal's mood or intentions
Control a mount during a risky maneuver
Train an animal to perform a simple task
Keep a wild animal from attacking
